artist: Walter von Nessen; Pattyn Products Company, Detroit, Michigan
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: metal lamp with six round discs at top
text: The complex aluminum and bakelite (an early kind of plastic) elements of this lamp, topped with disks around a glass shade, may remind you of an engine piston or a modern-day outdoor heat lamp. In designing this functional and no-nonsense lamp, von Nessen embraced the 1930s obsession with speed, efficiency, and the machine.
title: Table lamp
